metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12207 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high
metadata.Description: Improper invalidation for page table updates by a virtual guest operatingsystem for multiple Intel(R) Processors may allow an authenticated user topotentially enable denial of service of the host system via local access.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
